cosmetics.hello: Welcome to our special space for beauty and skincare
cosmetics.name: Cosmetics you deserve

clinic.title: Greetings, dear patients!
clinic.subtitle: I am Elizaveta Sergeevna Rusakova, a dermatologist, practicing in the field of cometology since 2017.
clinic.text1: My work philosophy is individuality, not following templates.
clinic.text2: I never consult patients with flashy slogans “-10 years in one procedure.”»
clinic.text3: Working with me is a systematic, clearly formulated, specific protocol.
clinic.text4: We do not have franchises, a huge uncontrolled team. We create a brand, a culture of healthy, young, and most importantly aesthetic appearance
clinic.text5: I am individual and perfectionist in my work, I have the highest possible requirements for the quality of the procedures we provide.

courses.title: About me
courses.text1: Elizaveta Rusakova Dermatovenereologist, cosmetologist, owner of a popular clinic in the city of Dnipro. Elizaveta has passed more than 30 advanced trainings, not only from Ukrainian specialists, but also from the European
courses.text3: In this course, Elizaveta has invested the basic and individual developments of her work. The course was created for cosmetologists to share information and experience, for specialists who cannot attend training in person. The courses are introductory in nature with the technique of a cosmetologist.

cosmetics.text1: We have thoughtfully and carefully curated this selection to address any need in home skincare. You won't find an endless list of creams and serums here.
cosmetics.text2: We have gathered different brands and selected only the effective formulas and products that we have personally tested.
cosmetics.text3: From our range, you can create any combination for dry, oily, combination, sensitive, or pigmented skin.

works.title: Results of our work
works.subtitle: We take pride in sharing the amazing transformations of our clients. In this 'Results of Our Work' section, you'll find before-and-after photos showcasing the outcomes of our innovative cosmetic procedures.

section.subtext: A sought-after beautician is good training and practice. Our video tutorials will help you become successful in cosmetology.

courses.title: Webinars
courses.subtitle: A sought-after cosmetologist needs good training and practice. Our video lessons will help you become successful in cosmetology.

description.2: Practical part: analysis of preparations, needle review, injection techniques, analysis of correction methods, demonstration on models.
Practical part: analysis of preparations, injection techniques, schematic demonstration, demonstration on models.

Practical part: Correction of the forehead, glabella, orbit area, processing of the temporal fascia, brow lift, correction of the nasal dorsum. Correction of the masticatory muscles, correction of the sternocleidomastoid muscle of the neck / chin, DAO, gummy smile / nasolabial fold, perioral wrinkles.
Practical part: Analysis of preparations, selection criteria for patients, mechanism of action, demonstration on models.

Practical part: Vector lifting of the midface. Correction of the nasolabial fold / marionette zone camouflage. Contouring of the jawline. Restoration of the preauricular fat pad. Camouflage of the jowl area.
Practical part: Processing of the cheekbone area, preauricular depression, temporal lifting, contouring of the jawline, nasolabial fold, labiomental angle, neck treatment.

cosmetics.title: Products
cosmetics.subtitle: Discover the world of our skincare products, designed to deliver deep cleansing and visible improvements for your skin. Our formulations are crafted to achieve maximum results and noticeable effects.

list.title: Zein Obagi Hydrating Cleanser
list.subtitle: Moisturizing cleansing gel for the face, for dry and sensitive skin.

opis: provides gentle cleansing of the skin;
has a pH of 6.5;
maintains the optimal state of the hydrolipid layer;
retains natural moisture inside the cellular structures;
has sebum-regulating, anti-age, anti-inflammatory, regenerative, soothing, and antioxidant effects;
evens out skin tone and texture.

list.title: Zein Obagi Gentle Cleanser
list.subtitle: Cleansing gel for all skin types

opis: gently cleanses facial skin without irritation or tightness;
maintains optimal hydrolipid layer condition (including sealing natural moisture within the cellular structure);
optimizes sebaceous gland activity;
reduces puffiness;
enhances barrier functions against external stress factors;
neutralizes oxidative stress and slows down aging processes;
provides softening, toning, and soothing effects.

list.title: Zein Obagi Exfoliating Polish
list.subtitle: Exfoliating scrub for all skin types

opis: provides exfoliating and antioxidant action;
maintains optimal hydrolipid balance (including creating a breathable veil to retain natural moisture in cells);
helps to fight against pigmentation spots;
has brightening, antioxidant, and strengthening properties;
normalizes the functioning of sebaceous glands;
positively affects the skin's natural barrier functions;
stimulates the process of cell renewal, making the skin smooth and radiant.
helps reduce existing skin redness and prevents future redness caused by UV exposure;
stimulates microcirculation to optimize healthy vascular functions and restore the skin's radiant appearance.
promotes the elimination and prevention of pigmentation spots;
used in combination with tretinoin treatment;
helps to effectively distribute melanin on keratinocytes, providing a therapeutic effect from mixing;
prevents moisture loss, being an effective hydrator with added lipid filler;
minimizes skin redness, preventing future pigmentation.

list.title: Zein Obagi Calming Toner
list.subtitle: Calming lotion for dry, weakened, and sensitive facial skin.

opis: provides powerful soothing and antibacterial action;
promotes additional cleansing and pore tightening;
neutralizes redness and irritation;
maintains optimal hydrolipid balance (including creating a breathable veil to retain natural moisture in cells);
stimulates regeneration and renewal processes;
enhances barrier functions against external stress factors.

list.title: Zein Obagi Exfoliating Cleanser
list.subtitle: Cleansing gel for normal and oily skin prone to acne.

opis: has a neutral pH — 6.0;
gently cleanses facial skin;
provides exfoliating action — removes the keratinized layer (due to chemical, non-abrasive impact on the skin);
maintains optimal hydrolipid balance (in particular, creates a breathable veil to retain natural moisture in cells);
enhances barrier functions against external stress factors;
normalizes sebaceous gland function;
neutralizes oxidative stress and slows down aging processes;
stimulates the processes of skin renewal and regeneration.
Soothes inflammation, redness, and skin irritation thanks to tea tree extract;
Second step in deep skin cleansing and restoration;
Evens out skin texture, making it smooth, soft, and firm through gentle exfoliation and surface peeling;
Enhances skin smoothness and radiance;
Balances skin tone, reducing pigmentation marks due to PHA.

list.title: REJURAN Concentrate Rejuvenating Vital Energy Booster
list.subtitle: Concentrate Serum

opis: Activates the antioxidant system to protect skin from the harmful effects of free radicals;
Prevents the appearance of fine lines, wrinkles, and other signs of aging;
Penetrates active ingredients to revitalize and rejuvenate the skin, restoring a healthy appearance;
Restores overall texture, evens tone, and enhances skin radiance.
Intensive hydration and nourishment for the skin, as well as strengthening the natural hydrolipid barrier;
Protects skin from the harmful effects of negative environmental factors;
Slows down the appearance of early signs of aging, such as fine lines, wrinkles, etc.

list.title: REJURAN Healing Cream Intensive Premium Activator
list.subtitle: Restorative Cream

opis: Provides long-lasting hydration, strengthening, and brightening for the skin;
Enhances skin elasticity thanks to an organic nutrient complex;
Nourishes and revitalizes dull and tired skin;
Prevents early signs of aging, such as fine lines and wrinkles;
Restores skin’s radiance and health.
Textured surface helps quickly and gently remove dirt, excess oil, sweat, and all types of makeup, while caring for and providing a micro-massage for the skin;
Nourishing antioxidant (lotus extract) helps protect skin from free radicals;
Plant extracts nourish, give a healthy glow, and even skin tone.
Protects against free radicals, preventing the formation of fine and deep wrinkles;
Restores optimal skin hydration without a heavy feeling;
Mattifies without giving a ‘whitish’ tone, doesn’t roll up, evenly spreads over the skin without leaving traces;
Fights inflammatory elements, soothes the skin.
Protects against free radicals, preventing the formation of fine and deep wrinkles;
Restores optimal skin hydration without a heavy feeling;
Color spheres even out skin tone when applied, giving you a wonderful healthy skin tone;
Gently conceals skin imperfections, fights inflammation;
Moisturizes, tones, and adds radiance without feeling heavy or leaving white traces.

list.title: DAILY RADIANCE VITAMIN C
list.subtitle: Antioxidant moisturizing cream C-Tetra with SPF 30

opis: After application, it melts into the skin and absorbs quickly, providing powerful antioxidant protection and an invisible SPF 30 broad-spectrum shield;
Bright and even skin tone, protection from photoaging and environmental stress.
Light moisturizing face cream that combines a light texture with deep hydration, restoration, and support of the skin’s protective barrier.

list.title: PORE CLEANSE GEL INTENSE
list.subtitle: Intensive cleansing gel with mandelic acid

opis: Gel based on AHA and BHA for intensive cleansing of skin and clogged pores;
Effectively cleanses and helps to shrink enlarged pores, improves skin texture.

list.title: HYDR8 B5 INTENSE
list.subtitle: Intensive serum with hyaluronic acid and NMF

opis: Stimulates the natural production of hyaluronic acid in the skin;
Prevents premature breakdown of HA molecules;
Provides immediate and long-lasting hydration throughout the day.
Gentle foam with rosemary gently removes all impurities;
Does not disrupt the delicate hydrolipid balance of the skin;
Ideal choice for sensitive and highly sensitive skin.

list.title: PRESS & GLOW
list.subtitle: Daily exfoliating toner with PHA acid and enzyme activator

opis: Synergistically works with vitamins C and A;
Helps achieve better results without sensitizing the skin;
The quickest way to beautiful, radiant, healthy skin.
0.06% retinal serum for regular vitamin A users;
Significantly reduces fine lines and wrinkles;
Strengthens and smooths skin texture, refreshes and improves skin tone and firmness.

list.title: SUPER C FERULIC
list.subtitle: Intensive brightening serum with vitamin C

opis: Highly concentrated and highly effective vitamin C serum;
Fights pigmentation, provides antioxidant protection and rejuvenation;
Visibly reduces fine lines and wrinkles, improves skin tone and texture.
The formula is designed to support the skin when using vitamin A-based serums.
Provides deep hydration, nourishment, and comfort to the skin throughout the night.
Minimizes signs of skin aging, adds softness, firmness, and a boost of restorative energy.

politics.text_1: The course was created for cosmetologists to share information and experience for specialists who cannot attend training in person.
politics.text_2: The courses are introductory in nature with the technique of a cosmetologist.
politics.text_3: Distribution and sale of courses purchased on this site is prohibited.
